snippet: The satellite radio service reported subscriber growth of 446,000 and a 14 percent increase in revenue in the third quarter.
abstract: The satellite radio service reported subscriber growth of 446,000 and a 14 percent increase in revenue in the third quarter.

headline.main: Steady Subscriber Growth Propels Profit at Sirius XM
headline.print_headline: Steady Subscriber Growth Propels Profit at Sirius XM
